scripts.test-ios: detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug && detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.test-android: detox build --configuration android.emu.debug && detox test --configuration android.emu.debug -l verbose

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project ios/DemoReactNativeJest.xcodeproj -scheme DemoReactNativeJest -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 7 Plus

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/DemoReactNativeJest.xcodeproj -scheme DemoReactNativeJest -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7 Plus
